animeDescription: An anti-war anime based on a book containing contemporary accounts of the fire-bombing of the city of Fukuoka on the evening of June 19, 1945.
animeStaff: [['Arihara Seiji', ['Director', 'Script']], ['Abe Hisashi', ['Key Animation']], ['Kurahashi Shizuo', ['Sound Effects']], ['Uratani Chie', ['Key Animation']]]
